title: AVGVSTANAE || CONFESSIONIS,|| EIVSQVE APOLOGIAE || Tabulis delineatae,|| & resolutae,|| PARS PRIMA.|| (- TERTIA.||) ADDITA EST E REGIONE CON-||FESSIO ECCLESIARVM SAXONICARVM, ET || Vuirtembergensium, Synodo Tridentinae oblata: ... || Concinnata haec omnia sunt, opera, & studio || VALENTINI ERYTHRAEI Lindauiensis: in || gratiam catechumenorum, ac rudium huius || sanae, piaé[que] doctrinae.|| Accessit confessio de Coena Dominica,|| eodem Erythraeo autore.|| ... ||
creator: Brenz, Johannes  Erythraeus, Valentin  Melanchthon, Philipp  Bucer, Martin  Camerarius, Joachim  Goldschmid, Johannes  Gremp von Freudenstein, Ludwig  Mathesius, Johannes  Luther, Martin  Müller, Christian  Spalatin, Georg
subject: Historische Drucke
source: Brenz, Johannes  Erythraeus, Valentin  Melanchthon, Philipp  Bucer, Martin  Camerarius, Joachim  Goldschmid, Johannes  Gremp von Freudenstein, Ludwig  Mathesius, Johannes  Luther, Martin  Müller, Christian  Spalatin, Georg: AVGVSTANAE || CONFESSIONIS,|| EIVSQVE APOLOGIAE || Tabulis delineatae,|| & resolutae,|| PARS PRIMA.|| (- TERTIA.||) ADDITA EST E REGIONE CON-||FESSIO ECCLESIARVM SAXONICARVM, ET || Vuirtembergensium, Synodo Tridentinae oblata: ... || Concinnata haec omnia sunt, opera, & studio || VALENTINI ERYTHRAEI Lindauiensis: in || gratiam catechumenorum, ac rudium huius || sanae, piaé[que] doctrinae.|| Accessit confessio de Coena Dominica,|| eodem Erythraeo autore.|| ... ||.
